attributes.action: Reverse the proposed increase in fuel tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He who giveth(2.5%) and taketh away (2%)
Alistair Darling once again shows his 
sleight of hand to the British motorist
where the VAT reduction might have made a real difference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
